title: Day 12: Krysta Palmer’s Lucky Charm
description:
3 Meter Springboard Bronze Medalist Krysta Palmer brings her lucky ring to In the Village to discuss her decision to attend the opening ceremony despite competing the next day, her time as a trampolinist and setting even bigger goals for her future.

In The Village takes you inside one of the most exclusive areas of the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games to discover the daily lives of athletes. Follow In the Village wherever you get your podcasts to automatically download every day until the closing ceremony.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Olympics)
